00021     ServerSocket::ServerSocket(SRPPSession * mysession,int ServerPort)
00022     {
00023         cout << "Creating the server socket..\n\n";
00024         if ((sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) == -1) {
00025                 cerr << "Cannot create server socket. Exiting... \n\n";
00026                     exit(1);
00027                 }
00028 
00029                 server_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00030                 server_addr.sin_port = htons(ServerPort);
00031                 server_addr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00032                 bzero(&(server_addr.sin_zero),8);
00033 
00034 
00035                 if (bind(sock,(struct sockaddr *)&server_addr,
00036                     sizeof(struct sockaddr)) == -1)
00037                 {
00038                         cerr << "Cannot bind server socket to " << ServerPort
00039                                         << ". Exiting... \n\n";
00040                     exit(1);
00041                 }
00042 
00043                 addr_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr);
00044 
00045                 thissession = mysession;
00046 
00047                 cout << "\nServer Waiting for client on port " << ServerPort << endl;
00048             fflush(stdout);
00049 
00050   }
00051

00055     ServerSocket::~ServerSocket()
00056     {
00057                 /* close socket */
00058                 if(close(sock) == -1)
00059                 {
00060                          cout << "\nCould not close socket\n";
00061                          return ;
00062                 }
00063 
00064 
00065     }

00068         string ServerSocket::getData()
00069         {
00070                 SRPPMessage srpp_msg = srpp::create_srpp_message("");
00071 
00072                 bytes_read = recvfrom(sock,&srpp_msg,sizeof(srpp_msg),0,
00073                                 (struct sockaddr *)&server_addr,
00074                                                                 (socklen_t *)&addr_len);
00075                 cout << bytes_read << endl;
00076 
00077                 //decrypt the packet
00078                 CryptoProfile * crypto = new CryptoProfile("Simple XOR");
00079 
00080                 srpp_msg = srpp::decrypt_srpp(&srpp_msg,crypto,thissession);
00081 
00082 
00083                 srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload[bytes_read] = '\0';
00084 
00085                 if (bytes_read > 0)
00086                 {
00087                         printf("\n(%s , %d) said : ",inet_ntoa(client_addr.sin_addr),
00088                                                                                                                    ntohs(client_addr.sin_port));
00089                         printf("%s\n", srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload);
00090                 }
00091 
00092                 fflush(stdout);
00093                 return string(srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload);
00094         }
00095 
00097         int ServerSocket::putData(string data)
00098         {
00099                 SRPPMessage srpp_msg = srpp::create_srpp_message(data);
00100 
00101                 //encrypt
00102                 CryptoProfile * crypto = new CryptoProfile("Simple XOR");
00103 
00104                 srpp_msg = srpp::encrypt_srpp(&srpp_msg,crypto,thissession);
00105 
00106 
00107                 data.copy((srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload),data.length(),0);
00108 
00109                 sendto(sock, &srpp_msg, sizeof(srpp_msg), 0,
00110                       (struct sockaddr *)&client_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr));
00111 
00112              cout << "\nWriting " << sizeof(srpp_msg) << " bytes \""<< srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload /*data.c_str()*/ << "\" to client" << endl;
00113 
00114                 return 1;
00115         }
